duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and team management.
Apply science expertise in item development and scoring process, and contribute to meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate with various stakeholders through different channels, including chat, email, phone, and videoconference meetings.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in job expectations and task performance.
Maintain clear communication and teamwork with project personnel and other Content Specialists.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science, Physical Sciences, or related field. Master’s preferred
